``` r
library(tidyverse)
library(ggvis)

(rd <- read_csv("rd.csv", col_types = cols(Person = col_skip())))
```

    ## # A tibble: 30 Ã— 3
    ##         x     z      y
    ##     <dbl> <int>  <dbl>
    ## 1  52.503     1 47.759
    ## 2  47.579     0 47.777
    ## 3  53.245     1 48.760
    ## 4  50.334     1 45.923
    ## 5  49.511     0 49.841
    ## 6  50.523     1 45.837
    ## 7  50.592     1 47.265
    ## 8  52.531     1 48.283
    ## 9  48.643     0 47.767
    ## 10 50.407     1 47.471
    ## # ... with 20 more rows

``` r
rd %>% 
  ggvis(~x, ~y) %>% 
  layer_points() %>% 
  group_by(z) %>% 
  layer_model_predictions(model = "lm", formula = y ~ x)
```
